trespass.util
Class ReflectionUtils

java.lang.Object
  trespass.util.ReflectionUtils

public final class ReflectionUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Provides static utility methods to gain easy access to classes, methods or fields that would normally be inaccessible due to their defined visibility, via Java's Reflection API.

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Eduardo Rodrigues
